name: Glow Squad Amazonian Clay Face Palette
about: What it is:An all-in-one blush and highlighter palette to elevate your look and give cheeks an illuminated flush of color..Highlighted Ingredients:- Amazonian Clay: For better, longer, truer wear..Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. These products are also vegan and cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:An all-in-one, dermatologist-tested blush and highlighter palette infused with Amazonian clay diamond complexu2122 to neutralize the appearance of skin discolorations, dullness, and darknessu2014with no glitter..This Palette Contains:
ingredients: -Amazonian Clay: For better, longer, truer wear..-Diamond Powder: Blurs the look of imperfections...Rose Glow:.Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Dimethicone, Distarch Phosphate, Boron Nitride, Octyldodecanol, Octyldodecyl Stearoyl Stearate, Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Diamond Powder, Kaolin, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Diisostearyl Malate, Silica, Tin Oxide. (+/-): Iron Oxides (CI 77491), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891)...Golden Glow:.Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Dimethicone, Distarch Phosphate, Boron Nitride, Octyldodecanol, Octyldodecyl Stearoyl Stearate, Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Diamond Powder, Kaolin, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Diisostearyl Malate, Silica, Tin Oxide. (+/-): Iron Oxides (CI 77491), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891)...Luminous Rose:.Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Mica, Dimethicone, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Tapioca Starch, Microcrystalline Cellulose, Silica, Diamond Powder, Kaolin, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Dehydroacetic Acid, Ethylhexylglycerin, Polymethylsilsesquioxane, Tin Oxide, Tocopherol, Xanthan Gum, Red 7 Lake (CI 15850), Red 6 (CI 15850), Ultramarines (CI 77007), Bismuth Oxychloride (CI 77163), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891)...Luminous Raspberry: .Mica, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Dimethicone, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Tapioca Starch, Silica, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Microcrystalline Cellulose, Diamond Powder, Kaolin, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Dehydroacetic Acid, Ethylhexylglycerin, Polymethylsilsesquioxane, Tin Oxide, Tocopherol, Xanthan Gum, Red 7 Lake (CI 15850), Bismuth Oxychloride (CI 77163), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77499), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891).
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.Blush: .-Sweep upwards along cheekbones...Highlight: .-Apply onto tops of cheekbones and high points of the face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dark skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: its so nice, really pigmented on dark/brown skin. I love this product so much you should 100% buy it. but the problem is the light pink on is WAYYY to light

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love it! The blush shades are so bright and pretty

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone
reviews.review_text: This little kit is beautiful! The only thing I could say is that the blush and bronzer arenu2019t super pigmented but nonetheless, they are buildable and give you the most beautiful glow! Definitely worth it

reviews.review_title: Love it as a blush/bronzer topper
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Was curious to see if this was an hourglass dupe - definitely less u201cinner glowu201d and more shimmery than hourglass, but not chunky or glittery. I use the pink shades as a blush topper and the bronze shade as a bronzer topper and they blend beautifully on top of other powder products. Only complaint is the bronzer shade is way too orange too use on its own on fair skin.
